headline: Coinbase Breaks Losing Streak As More Tariffs Loom; Is The Stock A Buy Now?
summary: Coinbase broke a four-day losing streak on Tuesday. Is Coinbase stock a buy or sell now? On MarketSurge charts from Investor's Business Daily, Coinbase stock has undercut its 200-day moving average. Coinbase shares also remain below their 50-day line.
